title: They're Coming To Make Him A Film Ha Ha With Devin Lucas
description: Devin Lucas is a writer and director from Southern California, who has made plenty of movies in the past, but nothing quite like the upcoming Under the Smogberry Trees, the true story of Dr Demento and Mr Hansen. He's part of Meep Morp Studio with Christine McDonald and Scott McKenzie, which is producing the film.
itunes:author: Glenn Fleishman
itunes:subtitle: Devin Lucas talks about crowdfunding a Dr. Demento documentary.
itunes:summary: Devin Lucas is a writer and director from Southern California, who has made plenty of movies in the past, but nothing quite like the upcoming Under the Smogberry Trees, the true story of Dr Demento and Mr Hansen.
